user_action_and_explanation: type "ameliorate" into the search bar with the placeholder "Search English—Chinese (Traditional)" to find its pronunciation and definition.
observation: The user successfully found the pronunciation and definition of the word "ameliorate" on the Cambridge Dictionary website. "Ameliorate" is pronounced \əˈmiːljəˌreɪt\ in UK English and \əˈmiljəˌreɪt\ in US English. It is defined as "to make a bad or unpleasant situation better." An example sentence provided is: "Foreign aid is badly needed to ameliorate the effects of the drought." Multiple example sentences using "ameliorate" are available for reference, showing its usage in various contexts.
